mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles ( user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id AS articleId, a.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, a.title AS title, a.created_at AS createAt FROM articles a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.created_at DESC

SELECT a.article_id AS articleId, a.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, a.title AS title, a.created_at AS createAt, COUNT(r.review_id) AS reviewCount FROM articles a JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN reviews r ON a.article_id = r.article_id GROUP BY a.article_id, a.user_id, u.name, a.title, a.created_at ORDER BY a.created_at DESC;
